review: Wonderful for accessing Amazon items.  OK for other services IF they are available for Fire.  The two that I am most interested in, it turns out, are not.Bigger problem was the ongoing dropping of the connection.  I replaced the Fire Stick with a Roku and have had zero issues with the connection dropping.

It has gotten a little better with the updates, but still there way too often.  Amazon streaming rarely has the same stutter.
